item.title: Blog 작성 참고자료
item.description: Awesome Patrick 글 작성을 위해 개인적으로 참고할 내용을 정리한 글입니다. Markdown 사용법 1. Task list - [ ] action one- [x] action two action one action two 2. Fraction 5/12 5⁄12 3. Latex dash Hyphen: tie-in, toll-free, two-thirdEn Dash: May--September, page 147--149Em Dash: Additional thought---as I've done here. Hyphen: tie-in, toll-free,
